PCREATE_PROCESS ( CLIView   ) 

The PCREATE_PROCESS macro.

.. 1. Defines the main() function. 2. Creates an instance of TeleKarma. 3. Calls instance->PreInitialise() which is inherited from PProcess. 4. Calls instance->InternalMain() which is inherited from PProcess. 5. instance->InternalMain() calls instance->Main() which must be defined in TeleKarma.
